attributes.action: Let learner drivers practice in lockdown with there household
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to do this because it is unfair on all the learner drivers who will have to oh more for lessons and put there test off longer, some people need to drive for there jobs they want to get, I have personally had my test cancelled twice already with my theory test expiring this year.
attributes.background: I want the government to change the rules and let learners drive with a person form there house hold and practice for there tests. During the lockdown as we cannot have lessons and I think it is very unfair that we cannot learn to drive

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559063

Under current Government guidance, you can practise driving with members of your household or support bubble. It must be travel for work, education or other essential journeys: https://www.gov.uk/driving-lessons-learning-to-drive/practising-with-family-or-friends
